1335070.name: Breath of Fire Sound Collection
1335070.description:
The original melodies of Capcom's 1994 16-bit RPG classic Breath of Fire heat up Steam! Breath of Fire Sound Collection features 49 sweeping, grandiose tunes from Yasuaki Fujita, Mari Yamaguchi, Yoko Shimomura, and Minae Fujii that are sure to conjure up lots of nostalgia.

The 78+ minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
